sources.title: 1933 Die Vom Niederrhein ( Fritz Kampers)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1933. Die vom Niederrhein.  U.a mit Fritz Kampers

metadata.Plot: Hans Steinherr will one day inherit the family steel-mill but prefers a living as a musician. He ends his relationship with ingenue peasant's daughter Hanne and ventures into the big city where he meets a famous singer.
metadata.Writer: Liselotte Gravenstein, Rudolf Herzog, Heinrich Köhler
metadata.Actors: Lien Deyers, Albert Lieven, Fritz Kampers
